channel.title: Click on obj and tele to ...? 562
channel.description: i know how to add objects (in actionsender), but how do i add a portal, so it teles you to a place and your player gets a message like 'good luck' or 'go north to pk'??

item.title: Click on obj and tele to ...? 562
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

that i do not know, can you just make a command to tele u somewhere with a message?
if so here is the code

replace XXXX with X cord and YYYY With Y Cord
commands.java

if(command.startsWith("THE NAME HERE")){
triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0);
brightness = 4;
sM ("good luck");
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Click on obj and tele to ...? 562
